result.eng: On the fourth day we saw a line of camels on the horizon.
result.ga: Ar an gceathrú lá chonaiceamar scuaine camall ar íor na spéire
result.orig: Ar an gceathrú lá chonaiceamar scuaine camall ar íor na spéire
result.html: Ar an gceathrú lá chonaiceamar scuaine camall ar íor na spéireOn the fourth day we saw a line of camels on the horizon.
result.ponchtml: Ar an gceaṫrú lá ċonaiceamar scuaine camall ar íor na spéireOn the fourth day we saw a line of camels on the horizon.
